ComicInfo.Summary:
This is the moment you've been waiting for! Ryu, Chun-li, Guile, Ken, and the rest of the world's greatest fighters arrive on Shadaloo's secret island as the Street Fighter Tournament begins! Who will make it to the final round? Plus, a bonus story featuring Street Fighter III's sexy ninja school girl - Ibuki!
